item.title: John Roberts Is The Face Of Leftists’ Judicial Coup
item.description: There has never been a figure in modern U.S. history who has done more to destroy the judiciary's credibility than John Roberts.

item.title: Grand Jury Indicts Democrat Representative For ‘Forcibly Interfering’ With ICE Officers
item.description: McIver is charged with three counts of 'Assaulting, Resisting, Impeding, and Interfering with a Federal Officer' and faces years in prison.

item.title: No Amount Of Nancy Pelosi’s Revisionist History Can Erase Her Key Role In J6 National Guard Delay
item.description: Pelosi’s claim that she ‘begged’ Trump to send the National Guard to the Capitol on January 6th is a proven lie.
